item.title: PodcastingのAcast、出版社が既存のペイウォールをApple Podcastsなどに統合できる「Acast+ Access」を開始（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Podcasting company Acast launches Acast+ Access to let publishers integrate their pre-existing paywalls into Apple Podcasts and other platforms  —  The technology means paywalled news outlets may more easily offer podcasts as a members-only benefit.  —  Podcasting business Acast has launched …

item.title: 社内発表：Los Angeles Timesの2023年の売上予測$232.5Mの約70%が印刷物によるもので、最近70人の雇用を削減したことの説明に役立つ（Ben Smith/Semafor)
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
Internal presentation: around 70% of the Los Angeles Times' projected $232.5M in revenue in 2023 comes from print, helping explain the recent cuts to 70 jobs  —  Progressive media activists, rattled by the collapse of a generation of youth-oriented digital news outlets like Vice and BuzzFeed News …

item.title: ピクサーは、写真を人気のある芸術作品に見せるために使われるAIの一種であるニューラル・スタイル・トランスファーを、映画『エレメンタル』の主役であるエンバーのアニメーションにどのように使用したか（Marah Eakin/Wired）
item.description:
Marah Eakin / Wired:
How Pixar used neural style transfer, a type of AI used to make photos look like popular artworks, to animate Ember, a lead character in its movie Elemental  —  It's harder to make fire than you might think.  But the Pixar team was determined to do the impossible.  —  Pixar had a problem.

item.title: Condé NastからVanguard Mediaのライセンスを受けて発行され、ロシアの侵攻以来、ウクライナの戦況に焦点を当てたVogue Ukraineの様子（Jo Ellison/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Jo Ellison / Financial Times:
A look at Vogue Ukraine, which is published under license from Condé Nast by Vanguard Media and has focused on Ukraine's war effort since Russia's invasion  —  How Vogue Ukraine became an unlikely voice of defiance  —  There was a huge kerfuffle surrounding the news earlier this month …

item.title: Duolingoはテレビ広告を大幅に縮小し、2023年第1四半期のDAUが前年同期比62％増の20.3Mになったのは、効率的なソーシャルメディアマーケティングによるところも大きいという。(Megan Graham/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Megan Graham / Wall Street Journal:
Duolingo says the company significantly scaled back TV ads and its DAUs growing 62% YoY to 20.3M in Q1 2023 is due in part to efficient social media marketing  —  The language-learning app now relies more on memes—helping it climb to 20 million daily active users

item.title: 2023年5月以降、Facebookのトラフィックが激減したというパブリッシャーもいる。Echobox：Facebookからパブリッシャーサイトへのトラフィックのシェアは、前年比で〜50％減少（Thomas Germain/Gizmodo)
item.description:
Thomas Germain / Gizmodo:
Some publishers say they have seen a sharp drop in Facebook traffic since May 2023; Echobox: the share of traffic to publisher sites from Facebook fell ~50% YoY  —  With no communication from the company, publishers relying on Facebook traffic are at the mercy of the inscrutable algorithm, and they say it's punishing them.

item.title: ブロッククラブ・シカゴの3人の共同創設者の一人であるステファニー・ルーレイにインタビューした。
item.description:
Mark Caro / Local News Initiative:
An interview with Stephanie Lulay, one of three co-founders of Block Club Chicago, as the nonprofit outlet hits its fifth anniversary with 29 full-time staffers  —  Exceeding its DNAinfo origins, Block Club Chicago hits 5th anniversary doubling down on the power of neighborhood reporting

item.title: アイマックス、北米市場シェアは2019年から50％増と発表 プレミアム大型フォーマットで特定の映画を観たいという需要が高まる中、スタジオがアクセスを巡って争う（Rebecca Rubin/Variety）
item.description:
Rebecca Rubin / Variety:
Imax says its North American market share is up 50% from 2019, as studios fight over access amid growing demand to watch certain movies on premium large formats  —  There's been a battle brewing between two of Hollywood's blockbuster talents.  —  In one corner, Tom Cruise is gearing …

item.title: CPJは、移民支援レターや家賃や食料などの生活必需品への助成金を通じて、亡命中のジャーナリストを支援したが、2022年には206回、2020年には63回と227％増加した（Lucy Westcott/Committee to Protect ...）。
item.description:
Lucy Westcott / Committee to Protect Journalists:
CPJ helped journalists in exile, via immigration support letters and grants for necessities like rent and food, 206 times in 2022 vs. 63 times in 2020, up 227%  —  Keep closely connected to your homeland and don't despair: that is advice Syrian journalist Okba Mohammad said he would offer …

item.title: 米国ポッドキャストランキング上位の451番組を調査：24％が真犯人番組、15％がニュース、18％が報道機関と提携、51％が番組に合わせてビデオを制作（Pew Research Center）
item.description:
Pew Research Center:
Study of 451 top-ranked US podcasts: 24% are true crime shows, 15% focus on news, and 18% are affiliated with news orgs; 51% produce video to accompany shows  —  Although it's much newer than other media like television or books, the podcast ecosystem has created a rich library of content covering …

item.title: ソースはこちらツイッターのリンダ・ヤッカリーノCEOは投資家に対し、現在、主要な広告保有会社が広告の一時停止を推奨していないこと、ツイッターの焦点は動画とパートナーシップであることを語る（Sheila Dang/Reuters）
item.description:
Sheila Dang / Reuters:
Source: Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino tells investors that no major ad holding firms now recommends an ad pause and says Twitter's focus is video and partnerships  —  Twitter plans to focus on video, creator and commerce partnerships to revitalize the social media company's business beyond digital advertising …

item.title: 情報筋の話：トーマス・フォックスがアレクサンダー・マカスキルに加えてフォックス・ニュースを去った。両者はタッカー・カールソンのプロデューサーで、アビー・グロスバーグの訴訟の被告である（Katie Robertson/New York Times）。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Sources: Thomas Fox has left Fox News, in addition to Alexander McCaskill; both were producers for Tucker Carlson and are defendants in Abby Grossberg's lawsuit  —  The departures are the latest fallout since the network sidelined Mr. Carlson in April.  —  Two top producers …

item.title: 12M近いフォロワーを持つTwitchストリーマー、xQcことFélix Lengyelが、オーストラリアのストリーミングサービスKickに参加するために2年間〜1億ドルの非独占契約を締結（Kellen Browning/New York Times）。
item.description:
Kellen Browning / New York Times:
Félix Lengyel, aka xQc, a Twitch streamer who has nearly 12M followers, signs a two-year ~$100M non-exclusive deal to join Australian streaming service Kick  —  The deal signed by Félix Lengyel, known as xQc, matches traditional athletes' contracts, and is another sign …

item.title: [スレッド】米国検察、幹部の性犯罪疑惑を調査したNHPRのジャーナリスト2人に対する破壊行為に関連して3人の男性を起訴（David Enrich/@davidenrich)
item.description:
David Enrich / @davidenrich:
[Thread] US prosecutors charge three men in connection with vandalism against two NHPR journalists who had investigated an executive's alleged sexual misconduct  —  Breaking: Federal prosecutors in Boston have filed criminal charges against three men for a string of attacks on the homes of @laurenchooljian and another @NHPR journalist last year. Story coming soon @nytimes Here's the backstory on the attacks >> https://www.nytimes.com/...

item.title: 情報筋の話：Cineworld CEOとその経営陣は、7月にChapter 11から脱却した後、合わせて$30M-$35Mの現金支給を受け、同社を去る（Financial Times）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: Cineworld CEO and his management team will receive a combined $30M-$35M cash payout to leave the company after it emerges from Chapter 11 in July  —  CEO Mooky Greidinger and his brother Israel to receive most of the cash after group emerges from Chapter 11
